attributes.action: Make the UK stay on British Summer Time all year.
attributes.additional_details:
The benefits of staying on BST in the winter include:
- more daylight in the afternoons improving people’s quality of life
- energy savings from people delaying using lights in the afternoons 
- reduced carbon emissions resulting from energy savings
- reduced accidents in afternoons as supported by RoSPA
- improve the safety of women who want to go outside in the afternoons during daylight hours
attributes.background: Legislate to make the UK stay on British Summer Time all year.

rejection.details:
